Packagecom.crazyfm.core.mvc.model
Classpublic class Model
InheritanceModel HierarchyObject SignalDispatcher Disposable Object
Implements IModel
Subclasses GameComponent, ModelContainer

Simple object that can contain data and do some logic. Can dispatch to hierarchy and receive signals from model hierarchy.
